Title: Python Developer
Description: Role & responsibilities Preferred candidate profile As a Python Developer Intern (AI/ML) , you will work closely with our development and data science teams on live projects, contributing to AI/ML model development, coding, testing, and deployment activities. This internship is designed to give you hands-on experience in both software development and AI/ML, preparing you for a long-term role with us. Assist      in designing, coding, and testing Python-based AI/ML applications. Implement      and fine-tune machine learning models. Work      with popular Python libraries like NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn,      TensorFlow, and PyTorch . Collaborate      with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality AI/ML solutions. Participate      in brainstorming sessions, technical discussions, and code reviews. Learn      and apply new AI/ML techniques and tools as needed for projects. echnical      Skills: Strong      understanding of Python fundamentals. Basic      knowledge of AI/ML concepts such as supervised/unsupervised learning,      neural networks, and data preprocessing. Familiarity      with AI/ML frameworks and libraries (e.g., Scikit-learn, TensorFlow,      PyTorch). Understanding      of data handling, cleaning, and visualization techniques. Knowledge      of databases (SQL/NoSQL). Soft      Skills: Excellent      verbal and written communication skills. Energetic,      self-motivated, and eager to learn. Ability      to work in a team and adapt to a fast-paced environment. Strong      problem-solving and analytical thinking abilities.

Title: Python Developer ( Bengaluru, Hyderabad, Pune)
Description: Responsibilities Write clean, maintainable, and efficient Python code for backend services or applications. Develop RESTful APIs or work on web applications using frameworks like Django or Flask. Implement data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL) processes using Python. Collaborate with front-end developers and other team members to ensure seamless integration. Test and debug applications to ensure they meet quality and performance standards. Participate in code reviews and contribute to the development of coding standards. Keep up-to-date with Python libraries and tools relevant to the project. Technical and Professional Requirements: Primary skills: Technology->Machine Learning->Python Preferred Skills: Technology->Machine Learning->Python Additional Responsibilities: Skills Required: Strong proficiency in Python 3.x. Experience with at least one Python web framework (Django, Flask, etc.). Knowledge of database technologies, including SQL and ORM (e.g., SQLAlchemy). Familiarity with version control systems like Git. Basic understanding of front-end technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript). Experience with unit testing frameworks like pytest or unittest. Knowledge of REST API design principles. Educational Requirements MCA, MTech, Bachelor of Engineering, BCA, BSc, BTech
